dialog.page: I will see you tomorrow in class.

false.say: I've actually almost finished my paper!
false.page: I just assigned that a few hours ago!
Most students wait until the last week of class to scramble and finish the assignment.

true.say: I was actually wondering if I could apply for your research assistant position.
true.page: Oh really?
You know that these are generally for upperclassmen...
true.say: I know, but I would like to try for it anyways.
true.page: Hmm...
I’m worried that this may get in the way of your other classes.
true.say: I've almost already finished my paper for your class. Would you like to see the draft?
true.page: Yeah, you said that earlier.
You seem to be very eager, which is something I look for in my research assistants.
Alright. You have proved that you have good qualities, but it will take a little bit more than that.
Here is a quiz about the world of research. Quickly fill it out and we'll talk.
true.say: A couple of these I don’t know at all.
true.page: Don’t give up hope now.
Are you finished with my quiz?
Wonderful, let me take a look.
Good, good.
I see that I couldn’t fool you with that question.
You answered the questions correctly!
Tell me, how did you out the answer to the last one?

option.page: Really? You are pretty smart, then.
Really? Honesty is a good trait. To be fair, there is a lot I look up as well.
Ha! I doubt that, but having a sense of humor is a good thing.

true.page: Anyway, I will have to think about giving you the position.
I don’t think I am going to be able to use you, though...
As I must consider upperclassmen first.
Good luck with your other applications. I will email you with my response after I review the other applicants.
You've done what you can for today. You should head to your dorm room and get some rest.
